context: I'm great thanks for asking. How are you? Oh great!
Have you seen Deadpool (2016) or the new Deadpool 2 (2018) Both hilarious and lots of comedy
I seen the new one but not the old one I loved it though Have you seen Vacation (2015)
I'd say any Marvel movie would be good like The Avengers (2012) or the new Avengers: Infinity War (2018) No I haven't but I heard of it a few times, I'll have to add it to my list.
resp: Avengers: Infinity War (2018) was awesome have you seen Black Panther (2018)

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a movie genre or a specific movie you'd like a recommendation for?
I'm looking for a movie that's both humorous and entertaining, emotional and thought-provoking, and heartwarming and wholesome. Do you have any recommendations that fit these criteria?
context.feelings: I'm excited to discover new cinematic narratives and experience a mix of humor, emotion, and heartwarming moments. I hope the recommender has some great recommendations for me.

context.content: I recommend "Good Will Hunting (1997)" for its blend of humor, emotional depth, and thought-provoking themes.
Can you tell me more about "Good Will Hunting (1997)"? I'd like to know about the humor, emotional depth, and heartwarming moments in the movie.
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Good Will Hunting (1997)" and see if it meets my criteria for a movie. I hope it has the right balance of humor, emotion, and heartwarming moments. Let's see if this recommendation hits the mark.

context.content: "Good Will Hunting" follows the story of a young janitor, Will Hunting, who has an extraordinary intellect but struggles with his past and personal relationships. The movie combines humor through Will's witty and sarcastic personality, emotional depth as he confronts his past and inner demons, and heartwarming moments as he forms meaningful connections with others. It's a touching and thought-provoking film that balances these elements beautifully.

That sounds like exactly what I'm looking for! I'm excited to watch "Good Will Hunting (1997)" after hearing about its blend of humor, emotional depth, and heartwarming moments. Thank you for the detailed information. I'm ready to experience this film. [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to watch "Good Will Hunting (1997)" after hearing about its blend of humor, emotional depth, and heartwarming moments. It seems to meet all my preferences for a movie. The recommender did a great job explaining the movie's elements, and I appreciate the detailed information. I'm looking forward to experiencing this film.
